card_text: Banish 1 "Springans", "Therion" or "Spright" card from your hand or GY, then activate 1 of these effects;$N●Special Summon 1 "Springans" monster from your Deck.$N●Special Summon 1 "Therion" monster from your GY.$N●Banish 1 Level/Rank/Link 2 monster you control and 1 card your opponent controls.$NYou can only activate 1 "Spright Smashers" per turn.
